entry.title: Bitcoin Protocol Specification
entry.summary: The author, Krzysztof, has posted a revised version of his work, the Bitcoin Protocol Specification, which has received feedback from Bitcoin Core developers and enthusiasts. He expresses gratitude for the suggestions and incorporates them into the updated document, which can be found at http://enetium.com/resources/Bitcoin.pdf. Krzysztof hopes that the revised version will be useful to the community and welcomes any additional improvement proposals.
